snippet: The Talking Band, a SoHo based avant-garde theater company that produced its first show 40 years ago, remains active and vital.
abstract: Experimental theater company Talking Band marks 40th anniversary with production The Golden Toad, opening at La MaMa's Ellen Stewart Theater.
lead_paragraph: The Talking Band, a SoHo based avant-garde theater company that produced its first show 40 years ago, remains active and vital.

headline.seo: The Talking Band Prepares a 40th-Anniversary Production
